My name is Morjina Solaiman and I'm from Bangladesh. I'm doing my PhD in biological science at the University of Idaho.My research interest lies in male pregnancy of a very interesting fish from syngnathidae fish family. I love to travel, watch movies and stay in my cozy sweet home.
